title: Question About Fully Repairing my Client --- PLS HELP
body:
Hello,

Because of recent problems with my client, I decided to commence a full repair. Right now, the little swirly loading sign is still going and it has been going for over a half hour now. Should there be a loading bar or does it just look like the scrolling wheel loady thingy this new client? I don't know if I need the repair is working or not. Pls help

replies.body:
Your repair could run for quite a while, depending on network speeds, so 30+ minutes isn't completely out of the ordinary.

Your repair just shows the loading circle and the number of processed files, there is no progress bar or any other text. Below is what a repair looked like on my computer just now:

https://i.imgur.com/NiQkh2A.png

Let me know if you run into any issues repairing.
Thank you so much for the help. It has been going for hours now and I do not see how many files have been processed. Should I just wait on it or should I reinstall?
I would have just let it run to completion. It's been a bit now, how did it end up going?
